thread.title: Wall Street falls on Syria, rate worries

title: Wall Street falls on Syria, rate worries
text:
Wall Street falls on Syria, rate worries 3:24am IST - 01:27 
Wall Street fell Wednesday as investors grew worried about possible U.S. military action against Syria and a more hawkish Fed view on interest rate increases. Fred Katayama reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Wall Street fell Wednesday as investors grew worried about possible U.S. military action against Syria and a more hawkish Fed view on interest rate increases. Fred Katayama reports.
